notes: Evidence only describes behavior within a single IE and does not relate the two fields across different IEs.

meta.evidence: dmrs-UplinkForPUSCH-MappingTypeB, dmrs-UplinkForPUSCH-MappingTypeB-DCI-0-2 \\ DMRS configuration for PUSCH transmissions using PUSCH mapping type B (chosen dynamically via PUSCH-TimeDomainResourceAllocation). Only the fields dmrs-Type, dmrs-AdditionalPosition and maxLength may be set differently for mapping type A and B. The field dmrs-UplinkForPUSCH-MappingTypeB applies to DCI format 0_1 and the field dmrs-UplinkForPUSCH-MappingTypeB-DCI-0-2 applies to DCI format \( 0 \_2 \) (see TS 38.212 [17], clause 7.3.1).

full_api_response.predicate: No valid inter-IE constraint between mappingtype and dmrs-uplinkforpusch-mappingtypeb based on provided evidence.
full_api_response.notes: Evidence only describes behavior within a single IE and does not relate the two fields across different IEs.
